item.title: Developing Portlets using JSF, Ajax, and Seam (Part 1 of 3)
item.description: InfoQ just published the first in a series of 3 articles for the JBoss Portlet Bridge. The author of this series did an unbelievable job. I could write a whole post about how great his article(s) are, but I would hate to loose sight of this post topic :-) heh - just kidding... the author is me! This first part is about basic JSF development with an easy to follow tutorial and real world development tips.
